last_episode_to_air.name: Chacha, This Is Politics
last_episode_to_air.overview: In the series finale a sudden twist of events has Chachaji needing Ronny’s help, and reaching out to him for it. Ronny agrees to help him campaign in exchange for all the harassment his family and friends faced to be undone. Ronny starts to whole-heartedly campaigns for Chachaji’s nomination for re-election as the Vidhayak (MLA).

name: Chacha Vidhayak Hain Humare
overview: Ronny Bhaiya leads a double life - To the world he is the nephew of the MLA - and likes to think of himself as a Jann Neta, and at home he is the jobless 26 year old with no sense of responsibility to his family. The show explores Ronny's adventures as he gets stuck in multiple situations because of this big lie that precedes him.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Ronny's whole life is based on a lie. To the world he is the nephew of the local MLA and a youth leader who solves people's problems. But in reality, Ronny is a jobless 25-year-old with no relation to the MLA who shares his surname. The show explores Ronny's adventures as he gets stuck in multiple situations because of this lie.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Rohit Pathak aka Ronny started out a young lad whose life is not driven by ambitions. All he wanted was a comfortable life where he can boast about himself. He pretends to be the nephew of currently-serving regional politician the much-feared Ashwini Pathak, since they both share the last name. His friends and followers take his word, and it’s all fun until uncle and nephew come face to face.

episodes.name: Fall and Pico
episodes.overview: Ronny Bhaiya has been entrusted with the responsibility of getting Avantika’s Saree’s Fall and Pico done as she needs to wear it for a work event. But his lie of being the Vidhayak’s nephew lands him into a situation where he needs to get an impounded bike back from a super cop- Singham for a 16 year old kid and also show his power by slapping him.

episodes.name: Tere Naam dekhi hai?
episodes.overview: Avantika needs Ronny’s help to get confirmed train tickets. Ronny has access to the “Vidhayak Quota” and can get it done easily. Unfortunately this promise turns out to be more challenging than was estimated. Meanwhile the flour at home is over- and father and son are having a power tussle over who must go and get the chakki ka aata for the rotis.

episodes.name: Yun Banta Hai Paisa
episodes.overview: Anwar is very confident in Ronny’s reach and gets a young boy Gaurav who needs admission in a college. Ronny reaches out to another fixer and gets himself and his friends into a financial mess. Meanwhile his father seems to be in some trouble at work and Ronny may solve his father’s and his problem by putting them in a deeper mess.

episodes.name: Bhaiya Ka Hoarding
episodes.overview: Ronny’s birthday celebrations begin with a surprise cake arriving at his doorstep. The love letter attached reassures him of Avantika’s affections towards him and makes his parents extremely suspicious of his activities. Meanwhile Avantika plans a surprise for Ronny with Kranti and Anwar, wanting to make Ronny’s biggest dream come true.

episodes.name: Chacha ka Driver
episodes.overview: Ronny takes up a job to put up posters on the sidewalks for ChachaJi. Avantika needs his help as ChachaJi's driver and trusted sidekick is harassing her friend. They are depending on Ronny to fix this situation considering he is related to Chachaji’s. He must somehow protect the girls while keeping the illusion of his relation to Chachaji alive.

episodes.name: Future ki Photo
episodes.overview: Ronny decides to lead a movement against the VC of a college on the request of some students. The VC has preponed their exam which endangers their careers. Simultaneously Ronny finds that in order to be eligible to marry Avantika he must find a job. When the situation at college goes from bad to worse, his personal life is left in a deeped shamble.

episodes.name: Sadharan Beta
episodes.overview: Ronny’s father learns about his attempt at self-immolation and asks him to leave Indore. Avantika runs away from home with Lucky but her parents think she and Ronny have eloped. They go to the Vidhayak to complain about his nephew, only to learn the truth that he is not Ronny's ChachaJi. A kidnapping case is filed against Ronny, and with Ronny missing his father is taken into custody.

episodes.name: Aur phir…
episodes.overview: In order to clear his name and get his father released Ronny needs to take Avantika to the police, but she has asked for his help in getting married to Lucky. A broken-hearted Ronny agrees. The Vidhayak and his men manage to catch Anwar. Ever-loyal Anwar confesses that while Ronny may have lied about his relation to Chachaji, he is in fact a great leader. Chachaji confronts Ronny about his lies.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Ronny's whole life is based on a lie. To the world he is the nephew of the local MLA and a youth leader who solves people's problems. But in reality, Ronny is a jobless 25-year-old with no relation to the MLA who shares his surname. The show explores Ronny's adventures as he gets stuck in multiple situations because of this lie.

episodes.name: Ticket Window Is Closed
episodes.overview: Ronny's lie of working for his 'Chacha', the MLA has come true. He now sets his sights on fighting the Parshad (Councilor) Election. However, when Chachaji makes it clear that the ticket will stay with the present Parshad, Ronnie is forced to spin a new lie.

episodes.name: Via Nahin, Direct Lagega
episodes.overview: Ronny’s world is shaken when Chachaji introduces him to the dead Parshad’s son Vicky who has returned from the US to ‘serve the party’ like his father. Ronny realizes he now has a formidable rival for the ticket.

episodes.name: Aise Aa Rahe Ho
episodes.overview: The conflict between Ronnie and Vicky heightens with the two indulging in one-up-man-ship to please Chachaji with their fundraising skills. Meanwhile, Ronnie is very taken by Shanoo’s friend Tanvi. But his past heartbreak resurfaces when he bumps into Avantika.

episodes.name: Nazdeek Ka Maamla
episodes.overview: With his new connections, Ronnie promises to help Anwar and Kranti with their dreams. He also starts growing closer to Tanvi. Things get complicated when Ronny hears the dark truth about Vicky’s past. Vicky spread a rumour that makes Chachaji doubt Ronnie.

episodes.name: Ronny Bhiya Soorma
episodes.overview: Vicky’s moves bear fruit when Tanvi accuses Ronnie of betraying her trust. And, just when he needs them most, a rift appears between Ronnie Anwar and Kranti. Ronny decides to get back at Vicky.

episodes.name: Humara Neta Kaisa Ho?
episodes.overview: Chachaji throws Ronny out of the party. Battered, bruised he swears off politics. Vicky threatens Ronnie’s family and friends. Tanvi fires a salvo in her battle with Chachaji leaving him embarrassed.

episodes.name: Bhiyaoov Raam!
episodes.overview: Ronny tries to do right by his friends and Tanvi. Avantika considers her future with him. Vicky tells Chachaji that he has a plan to take care of Ronnie once and for all. But Ronnie is also looking deeper at Vicky’s past.

episodes.name: Auqaat aur Sapne
episodes.overview: With Ronny and friends in disarray, all seems lost and they fear no one will come for the rally they have planned. Vicky’s gleefully shows the photographs of the empty rally ground to Chachaji. But it’s not over yet.

episodes.name: A Political Promise
episodes.overview: Ashwini Pathak threatens Ronny that he must quit politics or else his family and friends will come under attack. Ronny uses the opportunity to negotiate a secret bargain to garner favors for his friends. Ronny tries to stay away from politics and find something else to do, as his parents want him to get serious and settle down with Avantika. Yet somehow, Ronny ends up calling on Tanvi for help.

episodes.name: EZKT
episodes.overview: Ronny tries to solve the problems of a loan recovery app in exchange for a cut of the money he recovers, and bumps into a face from his past. Amrita sees Ronny with Tanvi and gets worried for Avantika, tries to have a conversation about it with her, but puts it across in suggestive hints and Avantika misunderstands it as Amrita’s concern over her own relationship with Rajesh Uncle.

episodes.name: Fly Bittoo Fly
episodes.overview: Lucky returns to win back Avantika, and cannot be sent away because his parents have died in an accident. Avantika puts up with a tearful Lucky while Ronny has to watch. Sushil, a big fan of Chachaji, comes to Ronny for help. His brother-in-law Bittoo lives with him and his wife Anita, and is preventing them from planning their life ahead. Sushil wants Ronny to get Bittoo to leave.

episodes.name: The Matchmakers
episodes.overview: Tanvi calls Ronny for a favor. Her friend Bhavya wants to get married to her boyfriend Neal, but Neal is afraid that his parents might not accept Bhavya because she is an orphan. Ronny comes up with an idea to pretend to be her brother, as they have the same last name, and asks them to fix a meeting with Neal’s parents. Meanwhile, Chachaji is preparing for the Chief Minister’s visit.

episodes.name: We Don't Talk Anymore
episodes.overview: Ronny is trying to be patient about Lucky’s return, even as Kranti and Anwar are suffering with their own grievances. Ronny finds himself entrusted with the mundane task of getting a new gas cylinder for the house, which leads to an unlikely encounter with Surekha Parashar, the leader of the opposition party.

episodes.name: Poster Boy
episodes.overview: The preparations for IDP event are in full swing at the Humari Party Office. Rahul notices Ronny Bhaiya’s photo is missing in the IDP banners and posters. Surekha Parashar extends a hand towards Ronny. Mahima asks Ronny to help her with the promotion of her snacks. Santosh and Ankur argue and Ankur reveals the truth to Santosh about the Parshad position.

episodes.name: Battlefield
episodes.overview: The Chief Minister accuses Chachaji for trying to perpetuate his personal agendas. Avantika confronts Ronny about joining politics when he promised her not to. Chachaji takes his revenge on Ronny, striking out as his family and friends, as promised. Ronny’s friends rally around to help.

episodes.name: Chacha, This Is Politics
episodes.overview: In the series finale a sudden twist of events has Chachaji needing Ronny’s help, and reaching out to him for it. Ronny agrees to help him campaign in exchange for all the harassment his family and friends faced to be undone. Ronny starts to whole-heartedly campaigns for Chachaji’s nomination for re-election as the Vidhayak (MLA).

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Rohit Pathak aka Ronny started out a young lad whose life is not driven by ambitions. All he wanted was a comfortable life where he can boast about himself. He pretends to be the nephew of currently-serving regional politician the much-feared Ashwini Pathak, since they both share the last name. His friends and followers take his word, and it’s all fun until uncle and nephew come face to face.
